text: innum evarkal (tunpankalukkum) cotanaikalukkum utpatuttappattapin (tam vitukalait turantu) hijrat ceytu (velikkilampinarkalo), pinpu arappor purintarkalo innum porumaiyaik kaiyantarkalo, avarkalukku (utavi ceyya) niccayamaka um'mutaiya iraivan irukkinran; ivarrukkup pinnarum, um'mutaiya iraivan mannippavanakavum, kirupaiyutaiyavanakavum irukkinran
